attributes.action: Urge the UK to Help the people of Gaza and call all world leaders for ceasefire
attributes.additional_details: This is the right thing to do if your human you can not watch this happen
attributes.background: Come together and to end this war and suffering in Gaza. Stop the Israeli occupation of Gaza and the West Bank. The world should live in peace with no suffering

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition: 

Seek a ceasefire and to end Israeli occupation of the West Bank and Gaza Strip - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648292
